name: Notion Net Worth Tracker
description: Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding Required, No Technical Skills Needed, Just One-Click Automation!It requires 2 things: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g., {{InvoiceNumber}}, {{ClientName}}). Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching head
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Template is available in36+ currenciesacross the globe; Instructions on How to change currency is added inside template; Available on all platforms and devices(MacOS, Windows, iOS, Android); Keep track of your financial situation in one central location.; Set your Net Worth Goal and assess your financial situation over time; Build assets and reduce liabilities to build net worth over time; Get an overview of assets and liabilities distribution at all times evaluating your Net Worth; Easy-to-use Interface:An intuitive and easy-to-use interface. It is simple to add your transactions to incomes, expenses, assets and liabilities that allows automatic updates to Net Worth.
